title: At the Shop
description: A simple conversation at a grocery store
transcript:
Shop assistant: Hello! Can I help you?
Customer: Yes, please. I want some apples.
Shop assistant: How many apples?
Customer: Five apples, please. And two bananas.
Shop assistant: Anything else?
Customer: Yes. One bottle of milk.
Shop assistant: OK. That's three dollars.
Customer: Here you are.
Shop assistant: Thank you. Goodbye!
Customer: Goodbye!

questions.question: How many apples does the customer want?
